div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

p.i: We create a balance between academics, fine arts, technological education, and athletics by providing a well-educated staff, the latest in technology and curriculum, and a supportive environment with an equal opportunity for all students to be successful.

div.p: Virtual Spring Spirit Week 4/20-4/24! Send your pics to 218-969-7778 or post to our District Facebook page

4/20 Quarantine Clothes- creative outfit or pajamas
4/21 Chalk Drawing or Picture of any drawing
4/22 Your Loves- favorite people or things
4/23 Outdoor Activity- current or past outside pic
4/24 School Spirit- Dress your family & pets in Spartan gear.

Hello NK Spartan Families,
Today was our third week of learning bundle distribution for Distance Learning.
There are still bundles at the elementary school waiting to be picked up. They are by door #1, our main door.

Other announcements:
If your child still needs a device to connect to the internet, please call the school to let us know when you can pick up an iPad.
Indian Education is sending out school supply bundles to registered families.
Congratulations to our April Students of the Month! They are leaders in the school and they are doing a great job during this distance learning time. Go Spartans!
